Allahvum avanutaiya tutarum unmaiyaiye kurinarkal'' enru connarkal. Tavira (ivai anaittum) avarkalutaiya nampikkaiyaiyum erru kilppativataiyum tavira veronraiyum avarkalukku atikappatuttivitavillai
